title: Bar magnet falls through wire coil

content.prompt: A bar magnet with its south pole pointing down is released from rest and falls through a wire coil, as shown above. A resistor is connected across the two ends of the coil. What current would be produced in the coil, as observed by a person directly above the coil?

choices.label: A current that is first clockwise and then counterclockwise
A current that is first counterclockwise and then clockwise

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
